Articles.Content: Hey all, as the title says "HI" just picked up KSP and have attempted about a dozen flights so far. Somewhere very successful and others, let's say, interesting to behold for me not the Kerbals. I do have a quick question if anyone has an answer. Would it be a good idea to get a joystick or Steam controller?

I don't know about controllers but joysticks are necessary if you plan to do atmospheric flight. The keystrokes are all or nothing while a joystick makes aircraft feasible by allowing partial extension of control surfaces. 

Welcome to the forum.
